KoreaKim wrote:

As far as i know

First of all, Your employer should write a letter showing the reason why he needs a foreign worker not Canadian, employment duration, wage, position, and duties(it should be related to your course !!!).
Then you have to fill out visa application form and send that with a supporting letter of employer to Case Processing Center in Calgary.

Sometimes immigration officer is going to call your employer and check the facts of letter he sent.  Here important point is that your employer should show  neccesary resons why he needs to hire foreign worker!!!

Good luck my friend and God bless you.
